document_data.name: Hyojosho
document_data.mainbody: The '''hyojosho''' was the highest court of the nation of [[Wa]]. It was one of the three primary offices of the shogunate.
document_data.Organization: The judges of the executive court were selected from city commissioners and special representatives of the Council of Elders, the [[roju]]. All judges had to be approved by the shogun, and to serve as a member of the hyojosho was a thing of great honor.
